title: Terrible Casting and many historical inaccuracies, Hard to watch.
review: Taking the angle this Director took was ridiculous portraying Neil Armstrong as an android like character, dwelling on the deaths in his life, being a cold family man and father, as well as spacey to his colleagues at NASA. It really never addressed his many accomplishments, his clearheadedness during pressure. It portray Buzz Aldrin as a pompous know-it-all and none of the actors even resembled any of the astronauts including Mr. Gosling whom a respect as an actor but wasn't right for this part. The movie was WAY too out there for my tastes and wished it had been a bit more like the Right Stuff.
